billing_commitment_none: You do not have a commitment on your {{serviceName}} commitment.
billing_commitment_commit_again_descript: You are currently committed to your {{serviceName}} commitment until {{endDate}}. You can now renew your contract for any period of time.
billing_commitment_payment_method_none: You do not have a valid payment method.
billing_commitment_summary_description_p: From {{renewDate}} onwards, your default payment method ({{paymentMethodName}}) will be automatically billed {{monthlyPrice}} for your {{serviceName}} service every month until {{engagementEndDate}}.
billing_commitment_summary_description_u: On {{renewDate}}, your default payment method ({{paymentMethodName}}) will automatically be billed at {{upfrontPrice}} for the entire commitment period.
billing_commitment_summary_description_p: The amount will be taken from your default payment method: {{ paymentMethodType }} {{ paymentMethodName }}
billing_commitment_success: The service commitment request has been processed.
billing_commitment_success_purchase: Please finalise the payment for your purchase order.
billing_commitment_summary_description_e: After {{endDate}}, your service commitment will be automatically renewed for the same commitment period.
billing_commitment_summary_description_p: After {{engagementEndDate}}, your {{serviceName}} service will be automatically renewed for the same duration and, if provided in the applicable promotion, at the same discount.
billing_commitment_summary_description_u: After {{engagementEndDate}}, your {{serviceName}} service will be automatically renewed for the same duration as your last commitment, and billed via the same payment method.
billing_commitment_none_with_discount: You do not have a commitment on your {{serviceName}} commitment. You can get a discount today if you add a commitment duration to your {{serviceName}} {{serviceType}} commitment.
billing_commitment_commit_again_descript: You are currently committed to your {{serviceName}} commitment until {{endDate}}. By extending your commitment, you can maintain your discount for your new commitment period. You can also increase your commitment and adjust your payment option for additional discounts.
billing_commitment_payment_pay_now_descr: Get an additional discount by paying the total amount in advance
billing_commitment_info_message: When you sign up for a subscription, you’re committing to use the service for the entire chosen period. In return, you benefit from discounts, free setup, etc. You can cancel the service whenever you wish; however, ending it before the agreed-upon time could incur fees or require payment for the remaining period.
billing_commitment_payment_method_error: There’s a problem with your payment method. You’ll be redirected to the ‘Payment method’ page, so you can resolve it.
